article_title: We like Trump’s policy on coal, CSX CEO says
article_text: Donald Trump’s support of the coal industry is sitting well with  CSX CEO Michael Ward.   The railroad company has seen a big decline in its coal  business, with freight volumes down 21 percent and revenue down  20 percent in the three months ending Oct. 31.   While Ward didn’t outright endorse the Republican nominee for president,  he told CNBC’s “Closing Bell,” “We certainly like his policy on  coal.”  “Secretary Clinton, I think, is less sanguine on coal,” he added.
